title: Cappuccino
creator_credit: Archer Films, Antony J. Bowman and Sue Wild
brief_description: A taxi-driver yearns to be a stand-up comic. He narrates the story about a group of middle aged actors and actresses who meet regularly at an inner-city cafe to discuss their relationships and work or attempts to obtain roles. Stars John Clayton and Rowena Wallace.
creator_credit_for_label: Archer Films, Antony J. Bowman and Sue Wild
